title: List of all Androidvr   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidvr   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: MD360Player4Android
repoList.description: It is a lite library to render 360 degree panorama video for Android. VR Player.

repoList.name: processing-android
repoList.description: Processing mode and core library to create Android apps with Processing

repoList.name: VRefreshLayout
repoList.description: This is an android library be used when the user refresh vertical layout.

repoList.name: VRCalendarView
repoList.description: Flexible calendar view

repoList.name: Pano360
repoList.description: Pure Java library to play 360 degree panorama video / photo (VR video) on Android. Using OpenGL ES 2.0  -安卓全景视频/图片播放器

repoList.name: VRDemo
repoList.description: A LibGDX VR application for android that uses the VRCamera library.

repoList.name: VRChatlin
repoList.description: VRChatAPI library for Android™

repoList.name: VRIX_ANDROID
repoList.description: Android Vrix Library

repoList.name: Android-Internet-requests-using-vRequest-library
repoList.description: Android Internet requests using Volley library

repoList.name: ZeroVrHeadTracker
repoList.description: An optimized Android head tracking library base on gvr-android-sdk(google cardboard sdk), 安卓头部跟踪/VR播放器/SensorFusion/HeadTracking
